hero-page.subtitle: Siyisitudiyo sophuhliso esinobuchule esizinze eJamani esisebenzisa iteknoloji yamva nje ukwenza imidlalo yevidiyo enomtsalane nefikelelekayo, ii-apps, kunye namava eendaba kuye wonke umntu.

download-page.title: Khuphela
download-page.subtitle: Apha ungakhuphela kwaye ujonge iiprojekthi zethu

tiers.description11: Ukungena nzulu kwikhowudi yethu kunye noyilo
tiers.description23: Umdlalo olula walo naliphi na ixesha nosuku

faq.title: Imibuzo Ebuzwa Rhoqo
faq.subtitle1: Ndiqhagamshelana njani nenkxaso yabathengi ukuba ndinombuzo okanye umba?
faq.description1: Ungafikelela kwiqela lethu lenkxaso yabathengi ngokuthumela i-imeyile ku:
faq.subtitle2: Yintoni eyenza imveliso yakho yahluke kwezinye kwimarike?
faq.description2: Imveliso yethu iyazahlula ngokuguquguquka kwayo, ukuqina, kunye neempawu ezintsha. Sibeka phambili ukwaneliseka komsebenzisi kwaye sihlala sizama ukugqitha okulindelweyo kuyo yonke inkalo.
faq.description3: Sele usinceda ngokuzama iiprojekthi zethu nokuzincoma. Kungenjalo ungabhalisa kwisitishi sethu seYouTube kwaye unxibelelane noluntu. Ukuze ufumane inkxaso eyongezelelweyo ungasinika umnikelo ngqo ngePayPal.

feature-page.title: Iimpawu
feature-page.subheader: Hlola iimpawu ezinamandla ezenza isicelo sethu sigqame.

items.title: Uyilo lweMobile-First
items.description: I-app yethu yenzelwe ngendlela ye-mobile-first, iqinisekisa amava angenamthungo kuso nasiphi na isixhobo.

items.title: Ideshibhodi enembile
items.description: Ideshibhodi ecocekileyo necwangcisiweyo ekunika umbono opheleleyo ngokujonga nje.

items.title: Ukuhambelana kwezixhobo ezahlukeneyo
items.description: Yonwabela amava angaguqukiyo nanamandla nokuba usebenzisa idesktop, ithebhulethi, okanye i-smartphone.

article.title: Isibhengezo seProjekthi eNtsha
article.description: Sibhengeza ukuba iprojekthi yethu entsha iya kuba ngumdlalo wevidiyo wedesktop wasimahla oza kufumaneka kuzo zonke iinkqubo zokusebenza namaqonga.
article.author: Michael Schenk, uMphuhlisi

article.title: Iwebhusayithi entsha
article.description: Sibhengeza ukuba iwebhusayithi yethu ekugqibeleni iphilile kwaye isesidlangalaleni.
article.author: Michael Schenk, uMphuhlisi

article.title: I-TouchSlider iphilile
article.description: Sibhengeza ukuba umdlalo wethu wevidiyo weselula i-TouchSlider uyafumaneka ukuze ukhutshelwe mahala kwi-IOS nakwi-Android.
article.author: Michael Schenk, uMphuhlisi

principles-page.title: Imigaqo yethu
principles-page.subheader: Ezi xabiso zisentliziyweni yayo yonke into esiyakhayo, ukusuka kumgca wokuqala wekhowudi ukuya kumava omsebenzisi okugqibela.

items.title: Ifikeleleka Kuyo Yonke Indawo
items.description: Sikholelwa ukuba isoftware enkulu kufuneka isebenzele wonke umntu, kuso nasiphi na isixhobo. Iiprojekthi zethu zenziwe ngobunono ukuze zihambelane namaqonga ahlukeneyo nokufikeleleka kwasekuqaleni.

items.title: Icoliweyo & Isebenza Kakuhle
items.description: Sihambisa amava apheleleyo nenzelwe ukusebenza kakuhle kakhulu. Ukugxila kwethu kulwakhiwo olucocekileyo kunye novavanyo olungqongqo kuqinisekisa ukuba yonke imveliso izinzile, iyasebenza, kwaye ilungele ukonwatyelwa ukusukela kusuku lokuqala.

items.title: Uyilo olunembile
items.description: Sikholelwa ukuba isoftware enamandla akufuneki ibe nzima. Uthando lwethu lulele ekudaleni ujongano olucocekileyo, olunembile olwenza lonke unxibelelwano lube lula kwaye lube mnandi.

items.title: Inikwe amandla yiNtsha
items.description: Sakha sicinga ngekamva. Ngokusebenzisa isoftware yamva nje kunye neteknoloji yehardware, sidala iimveliso ezicinga phambili ezinokusebenza okunamandla, okukumgangatho ophezulu.

items.title: Inkxaso Ezinikeleyo
items.description: Ulwalamano lwethu alupheli ekukhupheleni. Sinikezela ngenkxaso enobuhlobo, ephendulayo ngokuthe ngqo kwiqela lethu ukuqinisekisa ukuba uhlala unamava amahle ngeemveliso zethu, rhoqo.

items.title: Ubuchule obucokisekileyo
items.description: Sikholelwa ukuba ukugqwesa kulele kwiinkcukacha. Ukusukela kumbono wokuqala ukuya kumgca wokugqibela wekhowudi, yonke into yomsebenzi wethu icwangciswe kakuhle kwaye yenziwe ngokuchanekileyo ukuze kufumaneke imveliso yokugqibela engenaziphoso.

testimonials-page.title: Ubungqina
testimonials-page.subheader: Bona ukuba abathengi bethu, abaphuhlisi kunye nabavavanyi bayithanda ntoni ngeemveliso zethu.

testimonial.name: Michael Schenk
testimonial.testimonial: Ndiyayithanda kakhulu indlela le mveliso eguquguquka ngayo! Nokuba ndijongene neeprojekthi zomsebenzi okanye ndizintywilisele kwizinto endizithandayo, iyahambelana ngokungenamthungo neemfuno zam ezitshintshayo. Uyilo lwayo olunembile luye lwaphucula ngokwenene inkqubo yam yemihla ngemihla, lwenza imisebenzi isebenze ngakumbi kwaye ibe mnandi.

testimonial.name: Michael Schenk
testimonial.testimonial: Enye yeempawu ezigqamileyo zale mveliso yinkxaso yabathengi ekhethekileyo. Ngokwamava am, iqela elingasemva kwale mveliso liye laphendula ngokukhawuleza kwaye libe luncedo kakhulu. Kuyakhuthaza ukwazi ukuba bame ngokuqinileyo emva kwemveliso yabo.

testimonial.name: Michael Schenk
testimonial.testimonial: Umgangatho wokulula kunye nokusebenziseka lula kule mveliso wenze ubomi bam baba lula kakhulu. Ndiyababulela abayili ngokuhambisa isisombululo esingahlangabezani nje kuphela kodwa esigqitha kulindelo lomsebenzisi.

testimonial.name: Michael Schenk
testimonial.testimonial: Ndiyayixabisa ingqwalasela kwiinkcukacha kuyilo lwale mveliso. Ukuchukumisa okuncinci kwenza umahluko omkhulu, kwaye kuyacaca ukuba abayili bagxile ekuhambiseni amava akumgangatho ophezulu.

testimonial.name: Michael Schenk
testimonial.testimonial: Ndizamile ezinye iimveliso ezifanayo, kodwa le igqamile ngeempawu zayo ezintsha. Kucacile ukuba abenzi bacinge kakhulu ekudaleni isisombululo esijongana ngokwenene neemfuno zomsebenzisi.

testimonial.name: Michael Schenk
testimonial.testimonial: Umgangatho wale mveliso ugqithise kulindelo lwam. Yomelele, yenzelwe kakuhle, kwaye yakhelwe ukuba ihlale ixesha elide. Ngokuqinisekileyo kufanelekile utyalo-mali.
